tool_description: Get your text re-written in different styles, avoiding plagiarism, producing creativity
name: paraphrase
title: paraphrase

api_list.name: paraphrase
api_list.description:
Takes sentences as input in json format, and returns paraphrases

**Api payload :**
{
    "sentence": "What stories did your family members tell you growing up?",
    "is_diverse":true,
    "diversity":1.4
}

set "is_diverse" parameter as true/false
"diversity" controls how diverse generated sentence should be. Must be a float number > 1.0
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrase1.p.rapidapi.com/paraphrase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrase1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrase1.p.rapidapi.com/paraphrase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrase1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
